/**
 @page EXTI_GPIO_Interrupt

 @verbatim
 * @file    EXTI/GPIO_Interrupt/readme.txt
 * @version V1.00
 * @date    2016-03-02
 * @brief   Description of EXTI/GPIO interrupt example.
 @endverbatim

@par Example Description:

This example describes how to use EXTI and GPIO to trigger an interrupt. The LEDs will on/off by the buttons.
HT32F52230 only supports wakeup and Key1.

@par Directory Contents:

- EXTI/GPIO_Interrupt/main.c               Main program
- EXTI/GPIO_Interrupt/ht32fxxxx_it.c       Interrupt handlers

@par Hardware and Software Environment:

- This example can be run on HT32 Series development board.
